001package io.github.ai4ci.output;
002
003import java.util.stream.Stream;
004
005import org.immutables.value.Value;
006
007import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Outbreak;
008import io.github.ai4ci.flow.output.CSVWriter;
009import io.github.ai4ci.flow.output.Export;
010import io.github.ai4ci.flow.output.Export.Stage;
011
012/**
013 * Contact count distribution exported during simulation updates.
014 *
015 * <p>
016 * Main purpose: provide counts of contacts stratified by policy or bucket;
017 * records are produced at the UPDATE stage and are aggregated per simulation
018 * state and written to a CSV file ({@code contact-counts.csv}).
019 *
020 * <p>
021 * Downstream uses: useful for assessing contact distributions across policies
022 * and for calibration diagnostics.
023 *
024 * @author Rob Challen
025 */
026@Value.Immutable
027@Export(
028                stage = Stage.UPDATE,
029                value = "contact-counts.csv",
030                size = 16,
031                selector = OutbreakContactCountCSV.Selector.class,
032                writer = CSVWriter.class
033)
034public interface OutbreakContactCountCSV extends CommonCSV.State {
035
036        /**
037         * Selector for extracting contact count distribution data from an
038         * {@link Outbreak}
039         */
040        public class Selector implements Export.Selector {
041
042                @Override
043                public Stream<OutbreakContactCountCSV> apply(Outbreak t) {
044                        return CSVMapper.INSTANCE.toContactCSV(t);
045                }
046
047        }
048
049        /**
050         * Number of contacts associated with the bucket.
051         *
052         * @return the contacts value representing the contact degree bucket
053         */
054        public Long getContacts();
055
056        /**
057         * Frequency count of agents in the bucket.
058         *
059         * @return the number of agents observed with the given contact count
060         */
061        public Long getCount();
062
063        /**
064         * Policy or bucket associated with the contact counts.
065         *
066         * @return the policy label or contact bucket key
067         */
068        public String getPolicy();
069
070}
